meanings.definition: The outermost point of the spine of the scapula.
meanings.sent1: The acromions are the highest points on the shoulder blades.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often examine the acromions to assess shoulder injuries.
meanings.sent3: The acromions looked like tiny peaks on the bone mountain.
meanings.sent4: Her determination reached the acromions of success.
meanings.sent5: The acromions jutted out like miniature cliffs.

meanings.definition: The bony process on the scapula that articulates with the clavicle.
meanings.sent1: The acromions connect the shoulder blade to the collarbone.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes feel pain in their acromions after intense workouts.
meanings.sent3: The acromions whispered secrets to the neighboring bones.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was as strong as the bond between the acromions.
meanings.sent5: The acromions acted as bridges between two important bones.
